page.title: 07Harbertonford Village 1
page.content:
The village of Harbertonford is not very big but it is quite important. There are about one hundred houses.
The village has a fairly large district primary school which serves several of the surrounding villages. The school is very important because it brings people together. A lot of activities are based at the school in the evenings and during the holidays. These include a Cub scout pack, a Brownies pack, badminton classes and adult education classes.
In the village there are two shops and a Post Office. These do quite a lot of business as the nearest shopping centre is Totnes, about three miles away.
